exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type X : Type TX : reduction (Lbl A) X Unable to unify "Lbl A -> relation ?M1510" with "X".

In environment A : Type H : forall (X Y : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (TY : reduction_t A Y), bisimulation TX TY (bisim TX TY) X : Type TX : reduction (Lbl A) X x : X Unable to unify "reflexive (bisim TX TX)" with "union_st (expansion TX TX) x x".

original: unfold reflexive. unfold expand. unfold reduction_t in TX. apply bisimulation_bisim. apply bisim_refl.
